analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/30/0xbb1b85525dfa0c7b8da1e8b7b60f9f051894eb04.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/30/0xbb1b85525dfa0c7b8da1e8b7b60f9f051894eb04.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(_to) (/unique_chucks/30/0xbb1b85525dfa0c7b8da1e8b7b60f9f051894eb04.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_chucks/30/0xbb1b85525dfa0c7b8da1e8b7b60f9f051894eb04.sol)

Crowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/30/0xbb1b85525dfa0c7b8da1e8b7b60f9f051894eb04.sol#308-339) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/30/0xbb1b85525dfa0c7b8da1e8b7b60f9f051894eb04.sol#334)

Crowdsale.mint (/unique_chucks/30/0xbb1b85525dfa0c7b8da1e8b7b60f9f051894eb04.sol#339-354) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/30/0xbb1b85525dfa0c7b8da1e8b7b60f9f051894eb04.sol)

Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/30/0xbb1b85525dfa0c7b8da1e8b7b60f9f051894eb04.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
